Description: SHREE SAI BIOTECHis theleading Manufacturer, Exporter, Importer and TraderinAcross India.Coenzyme Q10(CoQ10) is a substance that helps convert food into energy. CoQ10 is found in almost every cell in the body, and it is a powerful antioxidant. Antioxidants fight damaging particles in the body known as free radicals, which damage cell membranes, tamper with DNA, and even cause cell death. Scientists believe free radicals contribute to the aging process, as well as a number of health problems, including heart disease and cancer. Antioxidants, such as CoQ10, can neutralize free radicals and may reduce or even help prevent some of the damage they cause. Some researchers believe that CoQ10 may help with heart-related conditions, because it can improve energy production in cells, prevent blood clot formation, and act as an antioxidant.

Description: Shree Sai Biotech is a professional manufacturer of natural ferulic acid. The content of natural ferulic acid we produce can reach 98.7% extracted from plant-derived rice bran, and the residual standard is far lower than the European standard, which can be widely used in food, medicine, health care products and cosmetics. We can provide you with high quality products at the best price, as a professional natural ferulic acid supplier, Green Spring is your best choice. The chemical name of Ferulic Acid is 4 hydroxy 3 methoxy cinnamic acid, which is one of the derivatives of cinnamic acid (also known as cinnamic acid, 3 phenyl 2 acrylic acid, molecular structure). Ferulic acid was originally found in plants Found in the seeds and leaves of the plant, it is a phenolic acid that is widely present in plants. It combines with polysaccharides and proteins in the cell wall to form the skeleton of the cell wall. It has a high content in Chinese medicinal materials such as Asafoetida, Angelica, Chuanxiong, Cimicifuga, Jujube seed, etc. It is one of the effective ingredients of these Chinese medicines and has been used as one of the quality indicators of Chinese patent medicines. Among the food raw materials, coffee, chaff, pandan beans, wheat bran, and rice bran also contain higher levels of ferulic acid. In recent years, researches on pharmacological effects have found many pharmacological effects and biological activities of ferulic acid and its derivatives, and the toxicity is low, so it has a wide range of uses in medicine, health care products, cosmetic raw materials and food additives.

Description: Alpha Lipoic Acid (ALA) powder is a potent antioxidant and metabolic cofactor with dual solubility in water and fat, making it versatile for pharmaceutical, nutraceutical, and cosmetic applications. Derived from octanoic acid, it exists in two forms: the natural R-lipoic acid (bioactive) and synthetic S-lipoic acid (less effective). ALA is widely used for its antioxidant properties and role in glucose metabolism, particularly in managing diabetes and neurodegenerative disorders.Alpha Lipoic acid powder is a light yellow powdery crystal, almost odorless. The solubility in water is low, about 1 g/L (20 ° C). Soluble in 10% NaOH solution, soluble in aliphatic solvents. It is easily soluble in methanol, ethanol, chloroform, and ether.
